testcase.classname: This feature will test Trello API
testcase.name: Create a new folder, list and task in the test space
testcase.system-out: Given The test space exists and contains the correct information............passed When I create the folder with title "Example folder"........................passed And I add a list with title "Example List" to the folder....................passed Then I check that the list name is "Example List"...........................passed And I add a task with title "Example task" to the list......................passed Then I check that the task name is "Example task"...........................passed
